#summary A Mavenized Version of the jboss-seam-2.1.2/examples/booking project

= A Mavenized Version of the jboss-seam-2.1.2/examples/booking project =

This is a Mavenized version of the jboss-seam-2.1.2/examples/booking project.

== Howto ==
The steps required to get the project up and running:
  * [http://www.glxn.net/seam-maven-refimpl/doc/tutorial/  The Getting Started tutorial explains the basic steps]
  * [http://seam-maven-refimpl.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/samples/jboss-seam/examples/booking Export project from svn]
  * Copy booking/config/profiles.xml to the project root folder, booking. Modify profiles.xml as needed.
  * Execute *mvn install -Pexplode*
  * You're ready to go!
  * Also read the *readme.txt* from the original example
